239174.en:
I hear a lot of noise out there. I wonder if the little guy's in trouble again. Oh, my God! Weak people are
nothing but a nuisance to this country! I'm sure Valeria-sama feels the same way!

239176.en:
This is Fortress Valdista, a strong and powerful fortress city ruled by Demon Queen Valeria! Valeria has
returned to her castle. We must be vigilant so that no more unauthorized people can come near our city! You
must stay away from the castle. If you show any suspicious behavior, you will be immediately put in jail!

239178.en:
I heard that Valeria beat the other Hero in the last battle in Astoltia. At this rate, it looks like we can
conquer Astoltia in plenty of time! Why don't they just go ahead and attack?

239180.en:
There used to be a brother in this country, Gannon Big Bro, who was an unruly, rough and tumble brother. They
were really crazy and enjoyed torturing people using the furnaces there. They'd make him drink molten
iron if he didn't like it. Eventually, the Demon King got so mad at them that he almost put their heads in the
furnace, but they escaped with their lives.

239182.en:
Relax... It still hurts where the superior beat me up the other day when I was late. That superior officer was
beaten up by another superior officer, and another superior officer was beaten up by Valeria. And the other
one was being severely disciplined by Valeria.

239184.en:
What the hell are you doing? We're on high alert right now! If you keep hanging around here, you'll be thrown
in jail!

239186.en:
Don't you dare wander around! I want
it! I'll crush it immediately if you
show any suspicious behavior!

239188.en:
There used to be a country called Gora further north than here. It had a grand name like ''City of Magic and
Illusion,'' but it was easily swept away by the wave of demon miasma.

239190.en:
Oooh. I drank too much yesterday
because Mizeri at the tavern begged me
to. My balls fucking hurt.

239192.en:
Valeria's eyes when she slashed that ex-prince of the exiled country. It's beautiful like a jewel, yet it's
fearful as if it has no emotion. But strangely enough, I'm really attracted to the Demon King. I want to be a
better man and serve by his side.

239194.en:
Jair is amazing. He's risen to Valdista number three at such a young age. He's loyal to his country, he's
smart, he's good with his face. He's very different from the shady Mr. Bertro.
239194.ja:

239196.en:
I heard that in Zechres, people are treated very differently depending on whose blood they are related to or
where they were born. It's stupid, because birth has nothing to do with a person's ability. Here in Valdista,
you don't have to go through that kind of crap!

239198.en:
The other night I was sleepwalking and forgot to put on my pants, but Valeria-sama saw me do it and almost
cut my head off. I was in such a big trouble then, but now, every time I think of those scornful eyes, my heart
swells in my chest. Hey, could this possibly be love?

239200.en:
That's right. There's no way I'd have
that kind of a sense of humor, right?
I must have been mistaken.

239202.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I knew it! In that case, I'll have to
convey this thought to Demon King-sama
as soon as possible!

239204.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hello... a visitor is here... please
make yourself at home...

239206.en:
The first invasion of Astoltia was proceeding smoothly under Valeria's command. In the midst of the fighting
over there, someone apparently set fire to our logistics. The situation was favorable, but we had no choice
but to retreat. The culprit has yet to be found, but if he is found out, it won't be a simple execution, Bubul.

239208.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Hey, you! You're a suspicious one! If
you don't want to get killed, get the
hell out of here!

239210.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>The blood chowzuke that daddy makes is
the best in the world!

239212.en:
The exiled JaMoule, huh? Well, I think there used to be a country like that. They lost the war. He should have
stayed quiet and played the drey. Stupid prince.
239212.ja:
ã€Œäº¡å›½ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã­ãˆâ€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ãã†ã„ã‚„ã€€ä»¥å‰ã€€ãã‚“ãªå›½ãŒ ã€€ã‚ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ãªæ°—ãŒã™ã‚‹ãªã€‚

239214.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Hmmm. Hmmm. What does ''monodane'' mean?
I guess it means to imitate.

239216.en:
Valeria, the Demon King of Valdista, has two close associates, Bertro and Jair. Both of them are very capable,
but Bertro should be more careful about his behavior as a leading figure in the kingdom.

239218.en:
I heard that the one who attacked the Demon King was a former prince of the Jamoule Kingdom, which was destroyed
long ago. He's a fool to go to his own death after having survived so long. Life is what makes a species, right?
239218.ja:

239220.en:
Jambi is a genius who picks on guys
like me Today, too, I work hard all
day to earn money to go to the store!

239222.en:
Master Bertro has come to return the sign he took with him in his drunken stupor. What a stupid person he is! I
woke up to find your sign next to mine!

239224.en:
Since when did the counter become a place to prevent customers from being blown away and flying off the handle?
Oh, I don't see any face, but don't bring me any more trouble, okay? Okay, bye.

239226.en:
C'mon! Valeria-sama is still strong!
She's so strong! Kill all the weak
ones!

239228.en:
Ha-ha-ha! What kind of idiot would dare to stand against Valeria? We should just kill them all! Hurray for
Valeria! Glory to Valdista!

239232.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Valeria is scary. I'll do my job
diligently so as not to offend
Valeria.

239234.en:
This is Fortress Valdista, a strong and mighty fortress city ruled by the Demon Queen Valeria! Try something
funny. Cannonballs filled with demon miasma stones will rain down on you in one fell swoop!
239234.ja:

239236.en:
After the attack on the Demon King, we were notified that no one is to pass through without permission. This
country makes no exceptions, even for messengers of other kings. Give up and go home!

239238.en:
Hey, you! You! You can't enter the castle! This country makes no exceptions, even for the messengers of
other kings. Give up and go home!

239240.en:
Valeria has two close associates, Bertro and Jair, but Valeria is a relentless person, so they are both
given quite a bit of work to do, and it seems they are having quite a hard time. I really wonder how a sloppy
person like Mr. Bertro can stand it, let alone the honest Mr. Jair.
239240.ja:

239242.en:
Huh. Those jewel-like cold eyes. Platinum hair that sparkles in the light. Her limbs like those of a
tight, athletic horse. It's a lie to say that heaven doesn't give two gifts. Valeria-sama has beauty,
strength, and even charisma! I envy Jair-sama for being able to be with Valeria-sama even though she's so
young, even becoming her close aide! I have to work hard to get ahead!

239244.en:
Oh, my... welcome... welcome... What? How to enter the castle? Hmmm... I might be able to work something out if
I can get in touch with the castle's elite, but... oh, come to think of it, Demon King's aide, Jair-sama, seems to
be visiting Galley's workshop... so I don't know if you should ask him there...

239246.en:
You're a hard man to give up, aren't you? No matter how much I ask, I will not let anyone through without
permission! Go to the tavern in the east, have some fun, and then return to your country!
239246.ja:

239248.en:
Hmm? You want to enter Valdista Castle? Hey, hey, hey. This country is not the kind of country that would let
unknown people like you into the castle so easily. If we could get in Bertro and Jair, there might be a
chance, but it's impossible. Give it up with a high hand.

239250.en:
Jambi is a genius who bullies guys like me Today, too, I work hard all day to earn money to go to the store!
Boohi? You want to join the castle? I don't know anything about that~! That's not important, let's go to the
tavern too!

239252.en:
Yeah? You want to get into the castle? What are you talking about? There was just an attack on the Demon King.
Unless you have the permission of a close associate of the Demon King like Bertro or Jair, they will never let
you in. In other words, it's impossible for a goofy demon with an air of innocence like you to get in!
Get lost!

239254.en:
The demon miasma stone from the Branick Quarry in the southeast is processed in the town's workshop to
make shells. It's dangerous to touch the demon miasma stone, so they use mining machines and dolls at the
mining site.

239256.en:
There is a quarry where demon miasma stone is mined in the southeast of Valdia Mountain Region. It is said
that demon miasma stone is dangerous if you touch it directly, so the people working there are very careful.

239258.en:
Oh, you guys have some nerve. Jair- sama is headed to Branick Quarry in the southeast of Valdia Mountain
Region, so you guys should be careful.

239260.en:
I wrote a Love Letter to confess my feelings to Valeria! I'll read it out now, so please listen! Oh, Valeria! I
feel as if I'm being scorched by a jet-black flame! How can I not tell you! I'll shoot your heart with my
mighty bow arrow! Please wait for me with all your heart! Ha-ha-ha. What do you think? Do you think it will work?
239260.ja:

239262.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>What the hell, Kisamat! I'll make you
dead with my powerful, fast May rain
shot!

239264.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Oh, yeah! This content is gut-
wrenching, huh? Oh~ what should I do?
I'm getting nervous~!

239266.en: <attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>My mother is a very strong woman!

239270.en:
My friend who is in the demon miasma stone mining business has not been heard from recently. I hope nothing is
wrong.

239272.en:
Boohee! I got some hot chili peppers from the guy who works at Kitchen! Boo hoo for Jambi with this! I have
perfectly prepared Medicinal Herb just in case she dies! I'm looking forward to it!

239274.en:
You want an audience with Valeria? The
Demon King doesn't have time for
travelers like you.

239276.en:
This is Fortress Valdista, a strong and powerful fortress city ruled by Demon Queen Valeria! Mukisama is the
one who has done what Jair said, isn't he? The royal castle is just west of here. Be sure not to do so in front of
Valeria!

239278.en:
I have heard from Mr. Jair. Good to go
through!

239280.en:
I heard you killed the quarry thieves! Thank you! Jair gave you permission to enter the castle, didn't he? Now we
can have an audience with the Demon King! If we make a lot of demon miasma shells, they will surely play a big
role in the next battle. I'm going to work with gusto! Hyahaha!

239282.en:
Hey, listen. I got a letter from Mizeri from tavern, asking me to come to the store to meet her. I wonder if
I should take this seriously.

239284.en:
You, at a time like this, you should
answer honestly, ''Yes,'' and let me
dream a little.

239286.en:
I hope so! That's right! It's a good thing I've been coming here so often! All right! I'm going to make this love
definitely come true! Thank you very much!
239286.ja:
ã€Œã ã‚ˆãªã‚ï¼ã€€ã ã‚ˆãªã‚ï¼ ã€€ä»Šã¾ã§ã€€è¶³ã—ã’ãã€€é€šã£ãŸã‹ã„ãŒ ã€€ã‚ã£ãŸã£ã¦ã‚‚ã‚“ã ï¼

239288.en:
I hear you're going to Valdista Castle to see Valeria. Ah! How generous of Valeria-sama to grant an audience to
such a dubious person like you! Try being rude in front of the Demon King. Even if I don't lay a hand on you, you
will be cut in half!

239290.en:
You defeated the bandits at the quarry? You're good. I like strong people. But all I get are guys who
want to bully me. Apparently, I have a talent for that.

239292.en:
I heard that Jair-sama gave you
permission to enter the castle! Let's
go through!

239294.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Hmmm. Hmmm. What is jungshok? I wonder
if it means beautiful colors.

239296.en:
In Branick Quarry, my friend was working, but I found out that he was attacked by a thief and died in the
line of duty. But I heard that the thief was executed. My friend who got killed must be thanking Valeria in the
afterlife!
239296.ja:

239298.en:
Here in Fortress Valdista, strength is value! We should kill every last weakling we can find! Hooray for
Valeria! Glory to Valdista!

239300.en:
There used to be a town called Gora in the northern part of this country, which was ruled by the former Great
Demon King Madesagora. The whole town was swallowed up by demon miasma a while ago. I think they are all dead
now. I guess that art fool Ossa wasn't cut out to be the Great Demon King. Don't worry about that Valeria!

239302.en:
Recently, it is rumored that Mr. Jair and his fellow travelers defeated the thieves that have been lurking in the
Branick Quarry. Ha ha ha! No way, it's not you! There's no way a simpleton demon like you can pull off such a big
deal, is there?

239304.en:
There's a new country south of Gerhena Field called Sand City Farazard. I hear that it's a haven for weak and
shady people who would be the first to be killed in Valdista. If you invade Astoltia, I hope you can take over
that unsavory new country as soon as you can! Ho-ho-ho!

239306.en:
Ughhhh.... I sent a Love Letter to Valeria-sama in the form of an arrow. I thought it was Assassin, but he gave
me a cold look and said I was just a fool. He thought I was a good bowman and saved me from execution, but
ohhhh...! Heartbreak is sad~!

239308.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Hmmm...hmmm...hmmm... What's a
butterbur? The kind you get on a rainy
day?

239598.en:
This is Fortress Valdista, a strong and powerful fortress city ruled by Demon Queen Valeria! A gift for
Valeria? The royal castle is just west of here. Please be careful not to make any mistakes!

239600.en:
Is it true that there is a massive outbreak of demon miasma in Moonlit Valley? According to the survey team,
that area was supposed to be clear, so why all of a sudden?
239600.ja:

239606.en:
I've been woken up again by my superior who wants to call a meeting. Even though I was sleeping
comfortably.

239608.en:
Valeria just galloped out with a
frightening look on her face. I wonder
what's going on?

239612.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Valeria, who didn't even look at me,
trampled me down on her horse without
mercy! I'm in love with you again!

239616.en:
I'm on vacation today, but I got an
order to go to the convocation. What a
hassle.

239618.en:
I was being pampered by Jambi's whip,
but then I got an emergency call! I'm
so sad!

239620.en:
This is Fortress Valdista, a strong and powerful fortress city ruled by the Demon Queen Valeria! Even if you
are a man of merit, we will throw you in jail if you show any sign of suspicious behavior! You'd better stay
quiet at best!
239620.ja:
ã€Œã“ã“ã¯ã€€ãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿è¦å¡ã€‚ ã€€é­”ç‹ãƒ´ã‚¡ãƒ¬ãƒªã‚¢æ§˜ãŒã€€æ²»ã‚ã‚‹ ã€€å …ç‰¢ã‹ã¤å¼·å¤§ãªã€€è¦å¡éƒ½å¸‚ã§ã‚ã‚‹ï¼

239622.en:
The last time I served, I wore a metal mask over my face to protect me from being hit by a superior officer. I got
10 times more Bangers than usual! I got 10 times more bangers than usual. Ouch.

239624.en:
In the country of Zechres in the east, they say that it is decided which bloodline you are born with that
determines whether or not you will become a rich man. It's absolutely ridiculous. Here in Valdista, strength
is everything. If you're strong, anyone can rise! It's great! Hmm? Weak ones? Throw them in the blast furnace!

239626.en:
We are now forbidden to let outsiders into the castle! Now, get out of here! You try anything and you'll get away
with it!

239628.en:
Hey, you! You! You can't enter the castle! This country makes no exceptions, even for the messengers of
other kings. Give up and go home!

239630.en:
I still can't believe that Jair was executed by Valeria, let alone Bertro. How could such a true, honest and
capable man be executed? I have no idea.
239630.ja:

239632.en:
I still can't believe that Master Jair was executed. Unlike the other rowdy soldiers, he was a nice young man who
was courteous to those of us in the workshop.

239634.en:
Listen to me! I confessed my feelings to Mizeri at the tavern. But she rejected me outside of the restaurant!
Damn ~~~~~! Damn! I'm going to train harder so that I can become stronger and get Mizeri to reconsider me!
239634.ja:

239636.en:
Hey, hey, did you hear? I heard that Jair was executed by Valeria. They didn't give a clear reason, but I'm
sure there must have been some unavoidable reason. Please wait for me, Valeria! I will make Anelas run up
the career ladder and become the newest member of his entourage!
239636.ja:
ã€Œã­ãˆã­ãˆã€€èã„ãŸï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãƒ¤ã‚¤ãƒ«æ§˜ãŒã€€ãƒ´ã‚¡ãƒ¬ãƒªã‚¢æ§˜ã« ã€€å‡¦åˆ‘ã•ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚“ã§ã™ã£ã¦ã€‚

239638.en:
I used to think I wanted to get ahead like Jair. But it's no use if I get killed even if I make it to the top!
I'm more suited to being a lowly soldier!

239640.en:
I can't believe that the loyal Master Jair was executed for treason. He seemed like a young man who had a lot
of feelings. If he had come to my house, I would have treated him well.

239642.en:
Did you hear? Master Jair has been executed for treason! That means the position in the entourage is now
vacant, and this is my chance to serve close to Valeria-sama! I can't do this. I've got to start training to
shoot 1,000 bow arrows!

239644.en:
Oh, my... you have a visitor...
welcome... would you like to join me
for a moment to talk about my story?<yesno><break>

239646.en:
Oh no~... Tsure nai~i Mizeri
kanashimi~..!

239648.en:
Thanks~~ Actually, Mizeri was shocked to hear that Jair was executed, but the customers who come here are the
ones who seem the most honest, and they pay the most money and make the most outrageous demands. When I see
that, I think that in the end, people's hearts and desires can't be understood by others. So I thought it
wouldn't be surprising if there was a darkness in Jair-sama's heart that others couldn't understand~. What?
Mizeri's secret? That's a secret...

239650.en:
The royal castle beyond this point is
off limits! Now, get the hell out of
here!

239652.en:
I heard Master Jair was executed. I thought that young people with such high loyalty to their country would be
hard to find. Well, sometimes, the more serious a person is, the more narrow-minded he becomes. You have to
vent a little in life. In that respect, Bertro-sama gives me a sense of security. He looks like he's a
loose cannon, but he's a hardworking guy, and he looks at his surroundings very carefully.
239652.ja:

239654.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Your father was crying the other day.
I wonder why.

239656.en:
I used to be upset whenever Bertro- sama would talk to Jair-sama, thinking that he was playing some kind of trick
on her. Now I think it may have been because he noticed something wrong with Mr. Jair and was worried about
him. Mr. Bertro may look like a bum, but he does a lot of work. Maybe he is a surprisingly capable person.

239658.en:
Branick Quarry has been opened and more and more demon miasma stones are being sent to the workshop. With this,
the next battle under Valeria's command will be an overwhelming victory! Our friend who died in the
quarry will be put to good use.
239658.ja:
ã€Œãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ‹ãƒƒã‚¯æ¡çŸ³å ´ãŒã€€é–‹æ”¾ã•ã‚Œã¦ ã€€é­”ç˜´çŸ³ãŒã€€ã©ã‚“ã©ã‚“ ã€€å·¥æˆ¿ã«é€ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ãã†ã ã€‚

239660.en:
Jambi is a genius who bullies guys like me Today, too, I work hard all day to earn money to go to the store!
Jair-sama should have lived more honestly in his heart. Ugh. I should have asked her out.

239662.en:
The other day, one of our girls got hit by a bad customer. I heard that Bertro secretly caught the guy who did
it. Bertro-sama often tries to pay the bill with a check, or gets drunk and takes our signboard with him. But when
he really needs help, he decides to help us. That's what makes him such a good guy.

239664.en:
Weak people deserve to be killed! I
bet Jair-sama wasn't so strong either!
Gahaha!

239666.en:
All this training is killing me. I can't wait for the next battle! Well, you duck demons like you, why don't
you go to Sand City Farazard? I hear it's a dump of a Demon World full of weak and cowardly people.

239668.en:
I can't believe they executed Jair, who adored Valeria so much. Valeria is so scary! She's strong, scary, and
awesome!

242925.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Hey! Don't get in the way of my
business! You're going to end up in
the blast furnace!

242927.en: <attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Huh. I'm at a loss. What should I do?

242929.en:
<turn_pc>Oh? Are you kidding me? You're not
talking to me like a newborn demon,
are you?

243148.en:
Yes, I heard the demon miasma stone is finally coming! Finally, the demon miasma stone is coming! With this, I'm
going to make powerful cannonballs and kick the crap out of Astoltia's miscreants!

245223.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><icon_exc><turn_pc>Hey, you! What are you eavesdropping
on? Get out of here right now or I'll
kill you!

249587.en:
Oh no, what should I do? I can't believe I messed up the material preparation. If things go on like
this, the worst that could happen is that someone could die.

249588.en:
Oh, wow. You are such a cute customer. My name is Boa, I'm an assistant to Dr. Roa, a military doctor in
Valdista. Nice to meet you You don't look familiar around here. Just as well. Would you do me a favor? Dr.
Roa asked me to prepare some medicine for him, and I need it as soon as possible, but I don't have the
ingredients. Can you help me get the ingredients?

249589.en:
Thank you. I need you to get me the roots of a plant called the Magic Kabuto weed. It grows in the northwest
of Valdia Mountain Region. Gently and carefully pull out the whole root. When you have collected the Horseshoe
Plant Root, come back to me. I'll be preparing a concoction in the meantime.

249590.en:
Thanks. I appreciate it. You're not taking on too many favors, are you? Finish your business early and come
back. Otherwise, the worst that could happen is that someone dies. Hmmm...

249591.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Oh, no. You're turning him down? Oh,
my God... if we don't do something, at
the worst, people will die.

249592.en:
Dr. Roa, the military doctor from Valdista, asked me to prepare a potion, but I screwed up preparing the
ingredients. Hey, honey. Can you help me get the missing ingredients?

249593.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>What I need you to procure is the root
of a plant called the demon kabuto
weed.<open_irai><bw_break>

249594.en:
It grows in the northwest part of Valdia Mountain Region. Gently and carefully pull out the whole root.
When you have collected the Horseshoe Plant Root, come back to me. I'll be preparing a concoction in the
meantime.

249595.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Welcome back! I see you picked up some
Horseshoe Plant Root. Can you give it
to me?

249596.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Oh? Was I wrong? I'd appreciate it if
you could bring it to me as soon as
possible. Please do.

249597.en:
Oh, no! You just picked this up without taking any precautions? I'm amazed that you survived despite the
fact that the demon kabuto weed is a dangerous and poisonous plant. If you get rashes, I'll gently disinfect
them, so just let me know anytime.

249598.en:
It's done! All I have to do now is give it to Dr. Roa, but I have other work to do. That's right, I'll ask you
to do it for me! I just put the concoction into this medicine box and I need you to deliver it to Dr. Roa of
Hypothermion, who is on the walls of Valdia Mountain Region. As I said before, it contains a very dangerous
and deadly poison, so please take it carefully.

249599.en:
The ramparts are just outside the center Fortress Valdista in Valdia Mountain Region, to the left. Well
then, nice to meet you .

249600.en:
Would you give Horseshoe Plant Root to
Boa?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

249601.en:
<pc> gave Boa the Horseshoe
Plant Root!

249602.en:
Boa grinded Horseshoe Plant Root and
prepared several medicines with great
dexterity.<se Joutyu_SE 46>

249604.en:
Now that you have the concoction in this medicine box, can you deliver it to Dr. Loa of Hypothermion at the
walls of Valdia Mountain Region?

249605.en:
The ramparts are just outside the center Fortress Valdista in Valdia Mountain Region, to the left. Well
then, nice to meet you .

249606.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Oh? Did Mr. Roa put you on the job?
You are such a pain in the ass.<open_irai><bw_break>

249607.en:
The insecticide has an earlier expiration date, so please go to Mr. Narve in the Living Area first, and
then Mr. Ento. I'd appreciate it if you'd remember to return the medicine chest to me when you're done. Thank
you .

249608.en:
Valdista Soldier is the strongest in the Demon World! No matter how strong the enemy may be, I will never leave
my post!

249609.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>I have an itch every day! By the way,
you seem to have something to say to
me.

249610.en:
Mooo! If you have nothing to do, don't talk to me! I'm already irritated because my body is itchy, so don't
make me feel even more irritated by doing something unnecessary!

249611.en:
Hmph. It's finally here, the most powerful weapon! With this, all the blood-sucking monsters that nest in my
house will be sent to the other side together!

249612.en: Would you give Narve the pesticide?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

249613.en:
<pc> took the insecticide
from Boa's Medicine Box and gave it to
Narve!

249614.en:
Now that we have delivered the pills to Narve, let's go to Ento, the gatekeeper at Valdista Castle, to
deliver the painkillers.

249615.en:
remembered that he was told to deliver the medicine to Narve first. Let's deliver the insecticide
to Narve in Fortress Valdista Living Area.

249616.en:
I'm still in pain if I'm not careful. It still hurts when I'm not careful. But this much pain is manageable for a
Valdista Soldier with guts!

249617.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><icon_exc><turn_pc>Oh, hey, what's up, man? What do you
want from me?

249618.en:
If you have no use for me, I'll ask you not to talk to me! Ugh. It started hurting again when I started speaking
louder.

249619.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr><icon_exc>What's this? A Boa special that will
make any pain go away! It finally
arrived! Let's get started.

249620.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>It works, it works, it works! The pain
in my back is disappearing like magic!<bw_break>

249621.en:
My husband was a soldier in the Valdista army and participated in the invasion of Astoltia. He came home
just in time because of an attack. They don't know who did it, but my husband said he saw a guy on his way
out that he didn't remember from the Valdista army. He said he saw a guy he didn't remember in the Valdista army
when he left, but he didn't see him when he came back, so he thinks he's the likely culprit. It must be a
conspiracy in another country!

249622.en:
Would you like me to give Ento a
painkiller?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

249623.en:
<pc> took a painkiller from
Boa's Medicine Box and gave it to
Ento!

249624.en:
Ento hurriedly tossed the painkiller
into his mouth!

249625.en:
Now that we've delivered all the
pills, let's return the medicine chest
to Boa.

249626.en:
Welcome back. I'm so sorry, Mr. Roa. He put you in charge of my work. What a pain in the ass. So, did you finish
the delivery safely?

249627.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Oh? You haven't done it yet. Oh, I'm
sorry. I guess I'm too impatient <heart>
Call me when you're done.

249628.en:
Oh, no! The medicine chest is empty! I guess you got the delivery right. Well done, well done! Well, I'll reward you
myself.

249629.en:
This country is always at war, isn't it? Thanks to that, people get injured all the time, so we sell a lot of
medicine and make a lot of money Our biggest customer is Bertro! He drinks a lot, so he often comes here
to buy medicine for hangovers. He also buys a lot of other medicines, like stomach pills and cold medicine. He
must be very sickly.

249630.en:
Anyway, that march was a hasty decision. It all started when a clownish fellow with a creepy smile
came to visit us. When Master Bertro tried to turn him away, Master Jair, who was passing by, became interested
in his story. The clown said the road to Astoltia would be open soon. Jair thought that was useful information,
so he passed it on to Valeria. I don't know who the clown was, but I felt a chill run down my spine when I saw his
face. What was that all about?

249631.en:
Would you like to return the medicine
chest to Boa?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

249632.en:
<pc> returned Boa's Medicine
Box to Boa!

249633.en:
This country is always at war, isn't it? Thanks to that, people get injured all the time, so we sell a lot of
medicine and make a lot of money Our biggest customer is Bertro! He drinks a lot, so he often comes here
to buy medicine for hangovers. He also buys a lot of other medicines, like stomach pills and cold medicine. He
must be very sickly.

249634.en:
Oh no, what should I do? I can't believe I messed up the material preparation. If things go on like
this, the worst that could happen is that someone could die.

249635.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Aaaan, already! My body is so itchy! I
can't cook dinner now!

249648.en:
Oh, no. I was so excited that I got a little carried away. I've been under a lot of stress. Vampire bugs are
vicious pests that live in bedding. When they bite, the itching doesn't stop. Now my husband and I can both
get a good night's sleep!

249652.en:
My husband was a soldier in the Valdista army and participated in the invasion of Astoltia. He came home
just in time because of an attack. They don't know who did it, but my husband said he saw a guy on his way
out that he didn't remember from the Valdista army. He said he saw a guy he didn't remember in the Valdista army
when he left, but he didn't see him when he came back, so he thinks he's the likely culprit. It must be a
conspiracy in another country!

249653.en:
In the haste to prepare for the invasion of Astoltia, I knocked over a cannon in a panic, got pinned under it
and, mercifully, cracked my lower back. Anyway, that march was decided on the spur of the moment. It all
started when a clownish fellow with a creepy smile came to visit us. When Master Bertro tried to turn him away,
Master Jair, who was passing by, became interested in what he had to say. The clown said the road to
Astoltia would be open soon. Jair thought that was useful information, so he passed it on to Valeria. I don't
know who the clown was, but I felt a chill run down my spine when I saw his face. What was that all about? Oops,
I've rambled on too much. Thanks for the delivery, and please give my regards to Mr. Boa.
249653.ja:

In Valdista, the only thing that counts is one's own strength. At first glance, no one would believe that
Slide is so strong, right? So, finding a sucker and earning a few coins every once in a while is our way of
surviving in this world wisely. Heh.

251391.en:
Oh, no. You are! I heard about you from Mr. Slide. I am really sorry for deceiving you! In Valdista, where we

Hey, you! You! You can't enter the castle! This country makes no exceptions, even for the messengers of

Oh, it's you. You have come well. With the return of Valeria, our country is gradually regaining its original
order. Perhaps it is because of your efforts that this has happened. By the way, do you have some business with
Valeria-sama? I think she's at the castle right now.

I'm sorry, but I've made a blunder. If I don't do something about it, Gannon Big Bro will be Valdista's brother.
Please, traveler! Please go to the castle and tell him that the town can no longer hold out.
